# Work In Data

An R package to reformat and work with the [Work in
Data](https://sites.google.com/site/gottliebcharles/work-in-data)
dataset.

## Data Access

Aggregated data are available in
[gender_gap/public/data.csv.gz](https://github.com/dissc-yale/WorkInData/tree/main/gender_gap/public/data.csv.gz).

You can load this into R directly:

``` r
data <- vroom::vroom("https://dissc-yale.github.io/WorkInData/gender_gap/data.csv.gz")
```

See the [Gender, Labor &
Growth](https://dissc-yale.github.io/WorkInData/gender_gap) site to
explore these or download in a different format.

Microdata are not currently accessible externally.

## Package Installation

Install the package from an R console:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("dissc-yale/WorkInData")
```

Then load the package:

``` r
library(WorkInData)
```

See the
[introduction](https://dissc-yale.github.io/WorkInData/articles/WorkInData.html)
for more.

# Package index

## Data

Functions to use the Work in Data dataset

- [`wid_open()`](https://dissc-yale.github.io/WorkInData/reference/wid_open.md)
  : Open Dataset
- [`wid_subset()`](https://dissc-yale.github.io/WorkInData/reference/wid_subset.md)
  : Subset Dataset
- [`wid_aggregate()`](https://dissc-yale.github.io/WorkInData/reference/wid_aggregate.md)
  : Aggregate Dataset
- [`wid_convert_isic()`](https://dissc-yale.github.io/WorkInData/reference/wid_convert_isic.md)
  : Convert ISIC Codes

## Information

Functions providing information about the data

- [`wid_variables()`](https://dissc-yale.github.io/WorkInData/reference/wid_variables.md)
  : Work In Data Variables
- [`wid_schema()`](https://dissc-yale.github.io/WorkInData/reference/wid_schema.md)
  : Work In Data Schema

## Utilities

Functions used to prepare the data and content

- [`wid_reformat()`](https://dissc-yale.github.io/WorkInData/reference/wid_reformat.md)
  : Reformat Original Data
- [`wid_make_summaries()`](https://dissc-yale.github.io/WorkInData/reference/wid_make_summaries.md)
  : Summarize Dataset
- [`wid_make_report()`](https://dissc-yale.github.io/WorkInData/reference/wid_make_report.md)
  : Report Variable Summaries
- [`wid_update_country_map()`](https://dissc-yale.github.io/WorkInData/reference/wid_update_resources.md)
  [`wid_update_isic()`](https://dissc-yale.github.io/WorkInData/reference/wid_update_resources.md)
  [`wid_update_resources()`](https://dissc-yale.github.io/WorkInData/reference/wid_update_resources.md)
  [`wid_update_world_bank()`](https://dissc-yale.github.io/WorkInData/reference/wid_update_resources.md)
  : Update Resources
